original_content:
Hackaday Europe 2025 is in full swing, and whether youre experiencing it live in Berlin or following along from home, heres where youll find all the info you need to get the most out of it.
Event Page: https://hackaday.io/europe2025
Chat: Hackaday Discord (Channels: europe-2025 / badge-hacking)
Talk Streams: https://www.youtube.com/@hackaday/streams
